name: Counter-Strike: Global Offensive
summary: Counter-Strike: Global Offensive (CS: GO) will expand upon the team-based action gameplay that it pioneered when it was launched 14 years ago. CS: GO features new maps, characters, and weapons and delivers updated versions of the classic CS content (de_dust, etc.).

name: The Witcher® 3: Wild Hunt
summary: The Witcher is a story-driven, next-generation open world role-playing game, set in a visually stunning fantasy universe, full of meaningful choices and impactful consequences. In The Witcher, you play as Geralt of Rivia, a monster hunter tasked with finding a child from an ancient prophecy.

name: Dota 2
summary: Dota is a competitive game of action and strategy, played both professionally and casually by millions of passionate fans worldwide. Players pick from a pool of over a hundred heroes, forming two teams of five players.

name: Rocket League®
summary: Soccer meets driving once again in the long-awaited, physics-based multiplayer-focused sequel to Supersonic Acrobatic Rocket-Powered Battle-Cars! Choose a variety of high-flying vehicles equipped with huge rocket boosters to score amazing aerial goals and pull-off incredible game-changing saves!

name: Zula Türkiye
summary: ZULA or GLADYO? Select your side and start to battle for good! Join ZULA, who fights against secret forces of international organizations or join GLADYO who tries to destroy ZULA!. With authentic local content and textures, Zula recaptures the feel and atmosphere of famous Turkish TV series.
